entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 1.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Greater Sudbury Airport 08:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 1.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 1.1°C
Wind: SSE 26 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Rain with periods of snow early this morning and with periods of drizzle late this morning and this afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle changing to flurries this evening and ending after midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this evening then light overnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
